=== Comments ===
Xiphos (karmic universe, lucid universe) is not exposed to insecure content, WWW. It is used as an engine to view Bible texts which libsword converts from it's internal format to html. Gtkhtml can be used instead of Xulrunner (looks ugly though) and work is underway to port to Webkit. -- DmitrijsLedkovs package maintainer.
